name: RhythmCraft
description:
Welcome to RhythmCraft, where you have to memorize crafting patterns and craft as many objects as you can without failing.

This game was made for the GamesPlusJam 3. You got your theme through a very cool random generator and mine was:

It's my first entry to a gamejam ever and though the game is not much, it was a great experience to think of something and finishing it in this little amount of time.

Assets I used for this game: Wooden GUI by REXARD, Fantasy Icons Mega Pack by REXARD and Ultimate Game Music Collection by John Leonard French.
